a.n: Jazz en Baie: Djangolized with Rhoda Scott

p.k: Aurore Voilqué has surrounded herself with an array of talented musicians including Jean-Baptiste Gaudray, Julie Saury, and Rhoda Scott to pay tribute to the great Django Reinhardt.
p.d: Aurore Voilqué has surrounded herself with an array of talented musicians including Jean-Baptiste Gaudray, Julie Saury, and Rhoda Scott to pay tribute to the great Django Reinhardt. The repertoire alternates between compositions by the illustrious Manouche ("Black and White", "Mabel", etc.) and standards ("Autumn Dream", "Blue Drag", etc.) to which this talented violinist offers a truly personal flavour.
